Articles.Content: How do you transfer fuel and other resources from docked ship to ship/station?
Docked ships act as a single one, so you can right-click on one tank then alt-right-click on another to open both their resource windows and use the in/out/stop buttons to transfer them.

How do you transfer fuel and other resources from docked ship to ship/station?

fun fact you can also transfer fuel through kerbals and asteroids
What Pecan said, but technically it's the mod key. If you are on a Mac, option+right click. On Linux, right shift+right click.

There are also mods, like TAC fuel balancer, that allow you to transfer fuel within a ship (or docked ships). If you want to transfer from several tanks, or to balance them, it's a better way to do it.
